body_html:
20 mins after posting previous comment error returned. When I was training my DDPG agent error occured after ~600 episodes:

2018-05-03 15:24:23.086336: E T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_UNKNOWN
2018-05-03 15:24:23.091324: F T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\common_runtime\gpu\gpu_event_mgr.cc:208] Unexpected Event status: 1

Maybe it is related to GPU running at full speed for a long time?

I will try to reproduce this using code without open ai gym, but I have to find an example that uses gpu for extended time first.

body:
20 mins after posting previous comment error returned. When I was training my DDPG agent error occured after ~600 episodes:

> 2018-05-03 15:24:23.086336: E T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_UNKNOWN
2018-05-03 15:24:23.091324: F T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\common_runtime\gpu\gpu_event_mgr.cc:208] Unexpected Event status: 1

Maybe it is related to GPU running at full speed for a long time?

I will try to reproduce this using code without open ai gym, but I have to find an example that uses gpu for extended time first.
